comments.body: doesn't this style of initializer on FieldAttribute cause the instance aliasing issue (eg, where all instances end up sharing the same empty list)?
nevermind- I see we added the isa check to deepcopy those for specific cases
@nitzmahone yes, we fixed that in the processing code to allow definitions to stay the same.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +72,76 @@    _async                = FieldAttribute(isa='int', default=0)
    _changed_when         = FieldAttribute(isa='list', default=[])
    _delay                = FieldAttribute(isa='int', default=5)
    _delegate_to          = FieldAttribute(isa='string')
    _delegate_facts       = FieldAttribute(isa='bool', default=False)
